galleries.name: Automatic Doors
galleries.description: Automatic commercial doors often utilize motion sensors or low-energy operation to automatically open and close as people approach, providing a seamless and convenient entry experience.

images.alt: Double wooden doors
Exterior view of accessible automatic glass door being open by person in wheelchair
Exterior view of two black automatic glass doors

galleries.name: Manual Doors
galleries.description: Commonly used without the use of automated systems. They have very few moving parts, making them simple to maintain and install. They may also continue to function even in the event of a power outage.

images.alt: Gray double doors
Gray double doors with half-height windows at the top of each
Gray double doors
Single gray door with vent at bottom

galleries.name: Glass & Aluminum Storefront Doors
galleries.description: Front entrance doors in grocery stores, public buildings, and other retail establishments. Aluminum storefront doors are known for their strength, security, and low maintenance.
